about_the_game:
Embark on an epic quest to save the realm of Kronos from the clutches of corruption in Guardians of Kronos a thrilling 4-player online co-op adventure. As one of the last remaining humans untainted by darkness, gather your friends and join forces to uncover the source of the corruption and vanquish its twisted inhabitants.

Team up and face hordes of enemies in fast-paced, action-packed battles. Strategize, communicate, and unleash devastating combos as you fight your way through waves of adversaries. Prepare for intense showdowns against colossal bosses that will test your skills and teamwork to the limit.

In your quest, collect an expansive arsenal of unique weapons, items, and cosmetics. Defeat bosses to acquire rare and powerful loot, granting you an edge in your battles against the forces of corruption. Discover hidden achievements and milestones that grant stars, which can be used to upgrade your weapons and unlock their true potential.

Experience the true essence of bullet heaven in Classic Mode, where your reflexes and precision will be pushed to their limits. Or delve into the immersive story-driven Mission Modes, featuring party dungeon-like content. Each mission unravels a part of the captivating story, bringing you closer to the ultimate truth behind the corruption that plagues Kronos.

Unlock and recruit new Survivors who will aid you in your quest. Unleash their unique abilities and combine your strengths to overcome even the most daunting challenges. Customize your characters with rare and exclusive cosmetics, showcasing your triumphs and style as you battle through the corrupted lands.

Guardians of Kronos is an exhilarating co-op experience where the primary objective is to have fun with friends while working together to defeat relentless hordes of enemies. Unleash your cooperative synergy, forge unforgettable memories, and emerge as the saviors of Kronos in this epic battle against darkness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Windows 10 (or higher)
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5-2.7 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Defeat the corrupted inhabitants of Kronos in this 4-player online co-op adventure. Uncover the source of corruption, collect unique weapons and items, and upgrade your arsenal with stars. Join forces with friends, vanquish hordes of enemies, and save Kronos in this epic co-op experience.
